ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Int items.
ygData.msgSnippet: What if you are a Gnome necro that has killed Lady Shae in Freeport a couple of times?  She scowled at me from the first time I saw her.  Killing her lowers
ygData.messageBody:
What if you are a Gnome necro that has killed Lady Shae in Freeport a couple
of times? She scowled at me from the first time I saw her. Killing her
lowers FelGuard faction. Can you still do the quest?

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenkins, Jason [mailto:jason@...]
Sent: 04/07/2000 12:12 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Int items.


I agree with most, but John never mentioned what race he was. If your a
Gnome or Erudite necro... DO THE MYSTIC CLOAK QUEST!!! It's a much better
item than the Molten cloak, Mystic Cloak stats are AC8 INT+5 SVMagic+5. Dark
Elves will have a very hard time doing the quest because of factions.

<Snip>

Manbik Prodo'Lues
The Flying Gnome Lich on Tunare
